ResearchProjectDef.label: drones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct autonomous drones for scouting or message delivery purposes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: macrocontrollers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to produce untrained macrocontroller cores at machining tables and construction of a self-contained simulator environment based on a AI persona core to train macrocontroller cores - devices capable of limited decision-making and autonomous control of installations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: laser communicators
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct outpost laser communicators that use the planet's unusually high number of large natural satellites to reflect messages back to distant planet-side receivers.
